fields.description: The input output files of the job.
fields.default_content:
>>>IO_FILES: Begin of the data block 
 &IO_File_Names   IO_file_nomenclature = 'USER-SPECIFIED',   ! Options: 'STANDARD-T', 'INPUT-FILE-NAME-BASED' OR 'USER-SPECIFIED'
                 MESH_file_name  = 'mesh',                     ! The name of the MESH file  (These are needed only when <IO_file_nomenclature> = 'USER-SPECIFIED')
                 INCON_file_name = 'incon',                    ! The name of the INCON file
                 SAVE_file_name  = 'SAVE',                     ! The name of the SAVE file
                 SinkSource_file_name = 'sinks_sources'          ! The name of the SinkSource file
                 /
<<<End of the <IO_FILES> data block
